bibl.title: Hermes but no Marrow: Another Look at a Puzzling Magical Spell.
bibl.note: P. Oxy. sans No. d'Inv. [ed.: Eric G. Turner, The Marrow of Hermes, Images of Man in Ancient and Medieval Thought. Studia Gerardo Verbeke dicata (Louvain, 1976) pp. 169-173 et 1 pl.]. - Voir aussi: H.S. Versnel, A Twisted Hermes. Another View of an Enigmatic Spell, ZPE 72 (1988) pp. 287-292.
bibl.seg: Faraone Christopher A., Hermes but no Marrow: Another Look at a Puzzling Magical Spell.
